wifiApEnabled.title: Wifi access point enabled
wifiApEnabled.desciption: The wifi access point is enabled.

multiDevIssue.title: Multi device issue
multiDevIssue.desciption: The multi-device is not set up properly or there is an issue with the coordinator or one of the subordinate devices.

tpcStuck.title: TPC stuck
tpcStuck.desciption: The counting software is started but nor responding

tpcStopped.title: TPC stopped
tpcStopped.desciption: The counting software is currently not running.
